Values.Name: accepted
Values.Description: If the request was accepted and the server guarantees that the server state reflects a single execution of the operation.

Values.Name: rejected
Values.Description:
If the request was rejected because the combination of Repeatability-First-Sent and Repeatability-Request-ID were invalid
or because the Repeatability-First-Sent value was outside the range of values held by the server.

Operations.Name: send
Operations.Description: Sends a notification message from Business to User.

Parameters.Name: apiVersion
Parameters.Description: The API version to use for this operation.

Parameters.Name: repeatabilityRequestId
Parameters.Description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Parameters.Name: repeatabilityFirstSent
Parameters.Description: Specifies the date and time at which the request was first created.

Parameters.Name: clientRequestId
Parameters.Description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Parameters.Name: NotificationContent
Parameters.Description: Details of the message to send.

Headers.Name: Repeatability-Result
Headers.Description: Indicates whether the repeatable request was accepted or rejected.

Headers.Name: x-ms-client-request-id
Headers.Description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.
